descriptions.content:
Description

This category is used for ritual methods whose goal it is to predict the future, or to find information that is normally beyond the ken of ordinary individuals. Such rituals have a wide range of functions; their aims are often practical and worldly: determining the best time for undertaking a new endeavor, revealing the nature/identity of a particular obstacle, or predicting the time of one's death. Many of these rituals are performed for the benefit of individuals, but they can also be performed in the service of religion or religious institutions (for example, determining the identity of a reincarnation), or in the service of a polity (state oracles).

Note that some methods of divination and prognostication are more ritualized than others. This subject does not include astrology/calculation (dkar, skar rtsis, nag rtsis).

Related Terms

ltas, phywa, pra, thugs brtag, rna mthong, rno mthong, rtsis

Example Texts

  • mo dpe dang sa dpyad rmi lam brtags thabs
